Kakuzu, after using the [[Wind Release: Pressure Damage]] to create a whirlwind in the centre of the battlefield, releases through his [[Earth Grudge Fear#Masks|fire-mask]] a large fireball into the whirlwind, causing the fireball to split into several smaller ones that are sent in all directions in a fixed pattern.

== Trivia ==
* When there are four fireballs, the pattern takes a cross formation. When there are six fireballs, the pattern takes a star formation.
